# ll-spring-22-plan

## ontology

* resources
    * prototypes
    * how-tos
    * links
* show-your-work
    * images / show-your-works
    * show-and-tells
* to-do and done
    * projects
    * microprojects
    * actions
* events
    * workshops
    * office hours
    * hackathons
    * showcases
* media
    * raw media
    * auto-generated
    * edited and delivered


## goals

* fellows doing at least some office hours and workshops
* more effort into a few product-like things


## system

* synology 10 as hub
* all iMacs connected and standardized
*
